column4: I have a vexing problem.  I uninstalled some packages, but now when I reinstall them they don't get completely installed.  They are missing configuration files and such.   Tried purging deleting, etc, but when I go to reinstall - it doesn't work.
any ideas on what I may have done and how to correct?
ooo ok.. not sure then,,, did you try  sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
